__TOC__

There are two classifications of dirt bikes or off road bikes. They are design for specific functions. Normal road motorcycles usually have lightweight and small engines. They are for long suspension travel and high ground clearance. On the other hand, off road motorcycles are usually use in sports like motor cross and racing. There are dirt bikes for all ages, even <nowiki>[[http://www.mudsweatandgearsrecreationalfun.ca/index.html|kids dirt bikes]]</nowiki>. It shows that these sports can also be a form of recreational activities for the whole family. Prices of these motorcycles can be varied from the lowest to the highest. There are <nowiki>[[http://www.mudsweatandgearsrecreationalfun.ca/index.html|cheap dirt bikes]]</nowiki> and high-end bikes. Riders have their choices depending on the type they wanted to buy.
